description.value:
This staff is tapered at the base and carved into a gem-studded twist at the top. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify elemental creatures.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Frostbite]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breathe Fire], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pummeling Rubble], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Thunderstrike]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blazing Bolt], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lightning Bolt]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Fire]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Howling Blizzard], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Ice]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chain Lightning], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
